---
title: "R Packages"
---


## `traveltime`

<https://idem-lab.github.io/traveltime>

`traveltime` includes functions to calculate and create a raster of the travel time over space from a user-supplied collection of points.

## `sdmtools`

<https://idem-lab.github.io/sdmtools>

`sdmtools` is a set of utilities to support species distribution modelling workflows, primarily via manipulation of spatial data in `terra`.

## `idpalette`

<https://idem-lab.github.io/idpalette/>

`idpalette` provides a set of colour ramps and utility functions in [IDEM](https://www.thekids.org.au/our-research/brain-and-behaviour/child-health-analytics-research-program/infectious-disease-ecology-and-modelling/){target="_blank"}, [IDDU](https://mspgh.unimelb.edu.au/research-groups/centre-for-epidemiology-and-biostatistics-research/Infectious-Disease-Dynamics){target="_blank"}, and [ACEFA](https://acefa-labs.github.io){target="_blank"} palettes.
